title: PBE Account, Cannot Create
body:
Heyo!

I got the email that I have been approved for PBE access. I patched in the client and everything but when I go to create the account, I can't! It takes me to the Public Beta Environment page and when I click "PBE Status" to create the account, it just keeps resetting to the main PBE page. Any help or anyone else having this issue? I am eager to start testing but I can't create the account! Help please!!!

replies.body: It sounds like something is keeping you in a cycle, but some browser troubleshooting should fix it up.  Try clearing your [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)for a resolution, but you can also try  another browser or Incognito mode in case an extension is getting in the way.  Hopefully, that ill do the trick!
I went incognito and it worked for me! I am live and kicking ass with new Lux skin =)

Same problem, I have tried using other browsers and VPNs. When I go to the PBE signup page (same place the Create Account link in the email takes me), I do not see the login bar at the top of the screen. Is the website bugged due to the new top-bar layout on the League home page?
Thanks for the info here!  It sounds like there is some connection issue, but I don't really know for sure.  Are you able to try another device or connection entirely?  Let me know.

I have tried other devices, browsers, and internet connections. It is still bugged in the same way. I hate to damn myself out of receiving a PBE account because I've been reformed for a long while now, but this account was permanently banned about a year ago... Could that have any effect on my ability to signup?

As someone who is also having this same issue I am unable to do it on both my computer and mobile, they both just direct me to the main sign up page.  Clicking the "I want to help" button just refreshes the page without doing anything.  I have another computer I can try in a couple hours but I doubt it will be any different.

Thanks for helping with troubleshooting!  If you're getting PBE 500 errors, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look deeper.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
I am having the same problem as well.
Never mind, I tried again and it has fixed! Looking forward to testing!

I am having the same problem, but when i try to create an account it gives me a error: 500. I have tried cleaning out my cache, incognito, and using different browsers but nothing is working. I dont even know what else i can try.
i have the same problem and for some reason i cant create account even if it tells me ive been approved
I actually got an email and was able to make my account, but I can't get to the client download page.  It just says something about maintenance...?
